Name: Firefly
Desc: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, wearing a set of mechanized armor known as "SAM." Her character is marked by unwavering loyalty and determination.\nEngineered as a weapon against the Swarm, she experiences accelerated growth, but a tragically shortened lifespan.\nShe joined the Stellaron Hunters in search of a way to defy her fated demise.

1.Name: In Reddened Chrysalis, I Once Rest
1.Desc: When using the Enhanced Skill, ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the target's DEF. And the Enhanced Skill does not consume Skill Points.

2.Name: From Shattered Sky, I Free Fall
2.Desc: When using the Enhanced Basic ATK or the Enhanced Skill in Complete Combustion state to defeat an enemy target or cause them to be Weakness Broken, SAM immediately gains 1 extra turn. This effect can trigger again after <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

3.Name: Amidst Silenced Stars, I Deep Sleep
3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

4.Name: Upon Lighted Fyrefly, I Soon Gaze
4.Desc: When in the Complete Combustion state, increases SAM's Effect RES by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

5.Name: From Undreamt Night, I Thence Shine
5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

6.Name: In Finalized Morrow, I Full Bloom
6.Desc: While in Complete Combustion, increases SAM's Fire RES PEN by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When using the Enhanced Basic ATK or Enhanced Skill, increases the Weakness Break efficiency by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

131001.Name: Order: Flare Propulsion
131001.Desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of SAM's ATK to a single target enemy.

131002.Name: Order: Aerial Bombardment
131002.Desc: Consumes SAM's HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of SAM's Max HP and regenerates a fixed amount of Energy equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of SAM's Max Energy. Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of SAM's ATK to a single target enemy. If the current HP is not sufficient, then SAM's HP is reduced to 1 when using this Skill. Causes character's next <u>Action to be Advanced</u> by <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>.

131003.Name: Fyrefly Type-IV: Complete Combustion
131003.Desc: Upon entering the Complete Combustion state, Advances SAM's Action by <unbreak>100%</unbreak> and gains Enhanced Basic ATK and Enhanced Skill. While in Complete Combustion, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color>, and when using the Enhanced Basic ATK or Enhanced Skill, increases SAM's Weakness Break efficiency by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, increases the Break DMG enemy targets receive by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color>, lasting until the current attack ends.\nA countdown timer for the Complete Combustion state appears on the Action Order. When the countdown turn starts, SAM exits the Complete Combustion state. The countdown has a fixed SPD of <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak>.\nSAM cannot use Ultimate while in Complete Combustion.

131004.Name: Chrysalid Pyronexus
131004.Desc: The lower the HP, the lower the DMG received. When HP is <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> or lower, the DMG Reduction reaches its maximum effect, reducing up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. During the Complete Combustion, the DMG Reduction remains at its maximum effect, and the Effect RES increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>.\nIf Energy is lower than <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> when the battle starts, regenerates Energy to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>. Once Energy is regenerated to its maximum, dispels all <u>debuffs</u> on SAM.

131006.Name: Attack
131006.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

131007.Name: Δ Order: Meteoric Incineration
131007.Desc: Leaps into the air and moves without restrictions for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> seconds, which can be ended early by launching a Plunging Attack. When this duration ends, SAM descends and immediately attacks all enemies within a set area. At the start of each wave, applies a Fire Weakness to all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). Then, deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of SAM's ATK to all enemies.

131008.Name: Fyrefly Type-IV: Pyrogenic Decimation
131008.Desc: Restores HP by an amount equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of this unit's Max HP. Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of SAM's ATK to a single target enemy.

131009.Name: Fyrefly Type-IV: Deathstar Overload
131009.Desc: Restores HP by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of this unit's Max HP. Applies Fire Weakness to a single enemy, lasting for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s). Deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#5[f1]</unbreak> × Break Effect + <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color> of SAM's ATK to the target enemy. At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#6[f2]</unbreak> × Break Effect + <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> of SAM's ATK to adjacent enemies. A maximum of <unbreak>#7[i]%</unbreak> Break Effect is calculated.

1.PointDesc: While in Complete Combustion, attacking enemies without Fire Weakness can also reduce Toughness by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the original ability's Toughness Reduction.

Under Complete Combustion, when SAM's Break Effect is equal to or greater than <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>/<unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, attacking a Weakness-Broken enemy target will convert the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>/<unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> Super Break DMG.
For every <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> of SAM's ATK that exceeds <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>, increases SAM's Break Effect by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.
